website_summaries.verdict: No need for a bunch of extra lenses or equipment: this lightning fast digital camera takes standard, wide-angle, telephoto, and macro shots with ease.
pros: Along with still photos, camera takes 4K video and video footage can be made into still shots
Comes with battery, charger, lens caps, and strap
Relatively lightweight and comfortable in the hand
Photographers of all skill levels can use with a low learning curve
cons: May not take great shots in bad weather, as lens fogs up
Professionals feel that after 400mm, photos are not as sharp as other models

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: What I wish? that it was a touch screen. It takes fabulous shots at 3200 and 6400 ISO and I have to work a lot at this level without flash. I find the in camera light meter to be extremely accurate. My images nee little post processing. I can now take one camera instead of a body with numerous lenses. I use my Canon SLR now only for macro. The macro in the Leica isn't as good as a dedicated macro lens. Great camera for travel and for street photography. But when I am traveling I cover up the Leica name with black electrical tape.
customer_reviews.author: AbuelaLinda

customer_reviews.title: Top notch camera producing excellent results for it's class
customer_reviews.text: Top notch camera producing excellent results for it's class. Important to realize it is not a professional DSLR but is very good as a bridge camera. Really impressed with the video and focusing. Easy to carry and use. Good quality pictures for general use.I would give it a five star rating but I noticed that at 400mm the images area not as sharp as with my Nikon lens; then again, it is no where as expensive as my Nikon lens. At any rate I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: The Leica V-lux is an amazing camera. It can be used by photographers at all levels of skill with greta results. The telephoto lens is amazing out to 400 mm and stabilization is great. I have used Nikons in the past but this is so much lighter and easier to use. The pictures are better and I don't worry about crap on the mirror from changing lens. It is such a capable camera that we are only start to touch the surface of its abilities. Well done Leica. !!!
customer_reviews.author: Burt Y

customer_reviews.title: the effect is satisfied! Good seller
customer_reviews.text: Try to shoot nearly 100 photos, the effect is satisfied! Good seller, to the highest score.
customer_reviews.author: ming hai li

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it. It is a great camera and no ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. It is a great camera and no switching lens. Make sure you get a lens filter to protect the camera lens.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: it is an amazing camera. pictures come out awesome in all conditions ...
customer_reviews.text: it is an amazing camera. pictures come out awesome in all conditions and even when novices use the camera. Only downside is that the battery gets exhausted quickly. Even if you are on a 2 day trip you will need to carry the charger
customer_reviews.author: Rostow Ravanan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Fantastic zoom lens
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Fantastic zoom lens. Haven't really used all of its feature yet.
customer_reviews.author: TAlvarez

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Camera last week , alot to learn. Very impressive photos .Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Paying for the name. Buy a camera with larger sensor
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but pictures have too much noise regardless of light or ISO
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Epic
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many cameras but this is definitely the best I own. It's like a photographer swiss-knife. It performs very well even at higher ISOs, it's a superfast focus, the viewfinder is superb. The only drawbacks is that it's not tropicalized, and F closes maximum to 8.0.
customer_reviews.author: Fabri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and the results are great
customer_reviews.text: This camera is outstanding. Easy to use and the results are great.
customer_reviews.author: George Doty SR

customer_reviews.title: The camera was fine. I took nice pictures with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the camera on December 19. The camera was fine. I took nice pictures with it. But, then, I dropped it & cracked/chipped the lens. Sent it to Leica who said that the parts for repair are no longer available. That makes no sense to me given that I purchased it 8 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: MARTY CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: This camera is the best that for none Professional person like me
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the best that for none Professional person like me, it is very easy to operate, very light and taking excellent pictures. the only things I feel sad " I can not operate it with wireless remote shutter " There is no such a product can be purchased anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Yu

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Am in my mid 70's and unless there is a real need it is too heavy to cart my high end Canon with multiple lenses and a suitcase full of gear when this camera performs almost as well
customer_reviews.author: Terry J

customer_reviews.title: This is the best by far
customer_reviews.text: Magnificent, It has all I have wanting for such a long time. I have had them all, Sony, Cannon, Nikon, etc. This is the best by far.
customer_reviews.author: Boby Love

customer_reviews.title: May not be for the aged
customer_reviews.text: Probably a perfect camera for a professional or semi professional. Most likely a good choice for an individual with strong hands and nimble fingers. For an relative amateur in his mid seventies it is not so good. All those built in functions translate into myriad controls that can be very difficult to access and, generally, not that easy to use or even understand. Those three stars are meant only for those customers who share my limitations. I am quite positive that this camera will satisfy most younger and most of the more experienced photographers. If you have small hands and/or weakening fingers, I suggest you check it out at a camera store before buying it on line.
customer_reviews.author: Getnby

customer_reviews.title: Not had the camera long but it looks like it is going to be my go to camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Not had the camera long but it looks like it is going to be my go to camera most of the time over my Nikon dslr which can be heavy and cumbersome to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm John FIGUERAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice point & shoot camera, a good back up to my Canon & Nikon systems!
customer_reviews.author: Brenton Cooper

customer_reviews.title: What used to take me several minutes and several trials to get a picture that I was happy with using my newer DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Wow, once you look through the glass (lens) you will want it. That is what happened to me! What used to take me several minutes and several trials to get a picture that I was happy with using my newer DSLR, was nothing more than pointing and pushing the shutter button once.
customer_reviews.author: William K. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Fragile camera body/switches
customer_reviews.text: This Leica V-Lux camera works quite well (less the loose on/off switch) but was very much surprised and disappointed by the camera body workmanship. Most specifically - the switchers and levers on the camera body and lens are unaccepably poor quality (on/off switch, lens focus/ois switch) all are poor quality with at least 0.5mm of movement play. Seriously doubt that these switches - particularly the on/off lever will last a year with routine regular use. This is unacceptable for a Leica camera of any model (I own the Dlux 5 and 6 models - which are half the price and far better engineered and quality). There is no way I would keep this camera. Camera not the least weatherproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Mamma Mia!!!
customer_reviews.text: Manual too complex to understand (Yep! & I've got three doctorates) - need a cool 10 y.o. to get you started ......
customer_reviews.author: Terence E Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera, unfortunately the guide is not so clear ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice Camera, unfortunately the guide is not so clear so to get a prompt start. Mostly when I' have been a DSRL normal camera user.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best cameras of it's type. Photographic results are excellent. Build quality is great and is the perfect size. Pictures are clean,clear and sharp. Imagine stabilization is average. Leica glass in a large body point and shoot. Some say the camera is the same as a competing brand. Dont know for sure,but the results on my computer screen are fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: J. COLLETTE

customer_reviews.title: You'll enjoy using this Leica
customer_reviews.text: Have owned and still own a range of Leica products. This camera has very high image quality. Similar contrast and color to other Leicas. Extremely versatile and fun to use. May not be in the same category as the X and M, but very, very acceptable. I went with the Leica versus the FZ1000 because I never really cared for the Pansonic JPGs and this camera also has very good JPGs. Great price point for a Leica.
customer_reviews.author: Vettran

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have several cameras and a small fortune in lenses for those cameras. This is, by far, my favorite. I have taken professional photographs with this camera many times. It's clarity and depth of colors cannot be beat. Once upon a time, I used to take the tripod, camera bag with multiple cameras and assorted lenses. I still take those to make it look good, but this is my preferred camera. In this day and age of seemingly everyone having a camera with their phones, so many bad or mediocre pictures are being taken. Once folks see the pics taken with this camera, they will want copies and hire you for their next event.
customer_reviews.author: AZN8TV

customer_reviews.title: Great lens!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Swiss Army Knife of cameras. Solid, light body. The lens delivers 100%+.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Zumaran-Jones

product_meta.title: Leica V-Lux (Typ 114) 20 Megapixel Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD (18194)
product_meta.description:
The Leica V-Lux is the Swiss Army knife amongst high end compact cameras
Its fast and huge optical zoom lens, and its outstanding picture and video (4K) quality make it the best digital camera for travel, sports and outdoor activities

The camera is one of the most versatile compact cameras from Leica

With the Leica V-Lux you are best equipped to start an adventure and explore the world

Main features


 * Integrated flash
 * MP4. Recording time: max. 29:00 minutes
 * Zoom (Optical / digital / intelligent) : 16 x / 4 x / 32 x

RESOLUTION:

Still image:

4:3 format: 4864x3648 (17.5 M) (L), 3456x2592 (9 M) (M), 2432x1824 (4.5 M) (S)
3:2 format: 5472x3648 (20 M) (L), 3888x2592 (10 M) (M),2736x1824 (5 M) (S) 
16:9 format: 5472x080 (17 M) (L), 3840x2160 (8 M) (M), 1920x1080 (2 M) (S)
1:1 format: 3648x648 (13.5 M) (L), 2592x2592 (6.5 M) (M), 1824x1824 (3.5 M) (S)
Video:

NTSC Model

1920x1080 pixels, 60 p (FHD: 28 Mbps/MP4) (sensor output is 60 bps) (AAC)
1920x1080 pixels, 30 p (FHD: 20 Mbps/MP4) (sensor output is 30 bps) (AAC)
1280x720 pixels, 30 p (HD: 10 Mbps/MP4) (sensor output is 120 bps) (AAC)
640x480 pixels, 30 p (VGA: 4 Mbps/MP4) (sensor output is 30 bps) (AAC)
1920x1080 pixels, 30 p (FHD: MP4) (sensor output is120 bps) (High Speed Video)

PAL Model
3840x2160 pixels, 25 p (4K: 100 Mbps/MP4) (sensor output is 25 bps) (AAC)
1920x1080 pixels, 50 p (FHD: 28 Mbps/MP4) (sensor output is ist 50 bps) (AAC)
1920x1080 pixels, 25 p (FHD: 20 Mbps/MP4) (sensor output is 25 bps) (AAC)
